Message:
Hmmm... Is there
anything else we can play?
Hey, let’s get Cerberus, and...
Oh, yeah. Cerberus and
the others aren’t here.

Well, I’m hungry now,
so I guess it’s time
for me to go back.

Huh? If I stay here,
we can keep playing?

That’s true...
I had lots of fun
playing with all of you...

But yeah,
I wanna be with everyone.
If we all play together,
it’ll be much more fun.

And besides,
I gotta head back soon...
“Real Master” is gonna
get worried, after all.
